name: Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning
description:
You are a male person named Mike Gillbour and you have recently set up your own business as an investigative journalist and have been given an assignment to look around the small town of Darkwood. You accept the assignment, of course, and head straight to the first clue you have, "the hotel", which is apparently owned by a murderer, and you're there to get to the bottom of it. But in the end it ends the way no one would have guessed. The whole thing takes a huge turn and then the tide turns. Mysterious things happen, paranormal things happen and a strange story awaits you in Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning.

The 2 chapter has nothing to do with the 1. They both have different storys



The game has been developed by a single person. Therefore, there may be errors or bugs. If you notice any of these things, please report it directly to me so that I can fix it..
